title: Unordered HTML List
text:
An unordered list starts with the <ul> tag. Each list item starts with the 
<li> tag.
The list items will be marked with bullets (small black circles) by default:

title: Ordered HTML List
text: An ordered list starts with the <ol> tag. Each list item starts with the <li> tag.
The list items will be marked with numbers by default:

title: HTML Description Lists
text: A description list is a list of terms, with a description of each term.

The <dl> tag defines the description list, the <dt> tag defines the term (name), and the <dd>  
tag describes each term:

Example

<dl>
 
<dt>Coffee</dt>
 
<dd>- black hot drink</dd>
 
<dt>Milk</dt>
 
<dd>- white cold drink</dd>
</dl>

Try it Yourself »

examples.heading: Example
examples.code:
<dl>
 
<dt>Coffee</dt>
 
<dd>- black hot drink</dd>
 
<dt>Milk</dt>
 
<dd>- white cold drink</dd>
</dl>

title: HTML List Tags
text: For a complete list of all available HTML tags, visit our HTML Tag Reference.
